entry.title: New release for Dozzle: v8.12.1
entry.content:
üêû Bug Fixes

  • Only shows attach and shell for docker  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3731 (410f5)
    View changes on GitHub

entry.title: New release for Dozzle: v8.12.2
entry.content:
üöÄ Features

  • Adds shell behind a flag or env var  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3737 (076f5)

   üêû Bug Fixes

  • Update and improve zh-tw Traditional Chinese locale  -  by @PeterDaveHello in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3736 (b8a87)
  • Fixes cursor color on shell  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3738 (9ae7c)
  • deps: Update all non-major dependencies  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3735 (d5abf)
  • docs: Updates docs for shell  -  by @amir20 (ddcc5)
    View changes on GitHub

entry.title: New release for Dozzle: v8.12.3
entry.content:
üöÄ Features

  • Adds shell support for agents and swarm mode  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3739 (27478)
    View changes on GitHub

entry.title: New release for Dozzle: v8.12.4
entry.content:
üöÄ Features

  • Adds shell support for k8s mode  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3747 (8b058)

   üêû Bug Fixes

  • Trims spaces around remote agents and hosts  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3754 (8b4f5)
  • deps:
  • Update all non-major dependencies  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3741 (1e6b7)
  • Update all non-major dependencies  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3748 (11a78)
  • Update module github.com/puzpuzpuz/xsync/v3 to v4  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3749 (fa2dc)
  • Update all non-major dependencies  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3755 (8e2ae)
  • docs:
  • Updates docs for shell  -  by @amir20 (b8bc6)
  • Updates docs home page  -  by @amir20 (9b5aa)
  • Update nginx websocket config example  -  by @liutianping0326 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3745 (8c4fc)
    View changes on GitHub

entry.title: New release for Dozzle: v8.12.5
entry.content:
üöÄ Features

  • Adds limit to docker containers  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3766 (f363b)

   üêû Bug Fixes

  • Use light mode bg color as theme color  -  by @agneevX in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3757 (2a2f6)
  • Fixes mobile menu having the wrong padding  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3765 (9c2e0)
  • Update and improve it locale  -  by @andreatitolo in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3771 (f691a)
  • Fixes backdrop on fuzzy search  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3776 (37751)
  • deps:
  • Update all non-major dependencies  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3759 (e4fab)
  • Update all non-major dependencies  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3763 (21773)
  • Update all non-major dependencies  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3773 (42edc)
    View changes on GitHub
